Experienced Assistant Manager adept at problem solving, customer service and hiring and training hardworking, quality staff.
Store Manager equipped with extensive experience in retail management and sales.

Reliable Assistant Manager with 5 years in retail sales.
Coaches and encourages staff toward advancement using an enthusiastic and supportive attitude.
